climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 🌙【QUALITY SLEEP STARTS WITH A GOOD PILLOW】Are you always waking up with neck cramps or back pain? Our proven ergonomically designed, contoured memory foam pillow supports your head, neck, shoulders and back perfectly. The innovative design allows our pillows to naturally fit your curved spine perfectly, providing proper support for spinal alignment,makes you to shift between positions comfortably.So you will wake up relaxed and start a more energetic day.

🌙【2 HEIGHTS AND ARMREST DESIGNS】When you are still troubled about not finding the right height pillow, our cervical pillows have 2 different heights on both sides for you to choose, so you can choose the right one which is more suitable for your sleeping posture. And there are specific grooves that allows your arms to go under for comfortable sleep.This orthopedic pillow is suitable for all kinds of sleeping posture,such as stomach ,back ,side sleeping.

🌙【SLOW REBOUND HIGH QUALITY MEMORY FOAM】The neck support pillow is made of high quality CertiPUR-US certified rebound memory foam. Premium quality firm and not too soft for maximum comfort and great relaxation of your head, neck, shoulders and back muscles when you lie on your back or side.

🌙【BREATHABLE AND REMOVABLE PILLOWCASE】The DONAMA side sleeping pillow has a double-layer high-quality pillowcase, which is soft and stretches and contracts well with the pillow core. It is removable, has a zipper and is machine washable. Made from cotton and polyester, the pillowcase fits perfectly against the skin, and its soft, breathable fabric keeps you cool all night - keeps you from night sweats in comfortable climates, give you the comfortable sleep you've always wanted!

🌙【A SLEEP SAVIOR REALLY HELP】Pick out a great cervical neck pillows,you may find your sleeping quality improves unexpectedly. DONAMA brand pillows have been proven in the market for many years, and the pillows developed have helped many people sleep comfortably throughout the night. If you are looking for a pillow that fits better, welcome to try our pillows. Note: DONAMA pillows are not for medical use. If you have sleep disorders, please consult your doctor.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5 SECONDS SLOW-REBOUND MEMORY FOAM Premium and odorless memory foam with high density and slow-rebound provides firm support for your head and neck. It can be folded or pressed, makes your head stay no pressure state and feel comfortable. SOFT & BREATHABLE FABRIC Pillowcase was made of skin-friendly fabric, no chemicals contains, it can promote airflow to keep cool and care for your facial skin. MACHINE-WASHABLE PILLOW CASE Hidden zipper helps you remove the pillowcase at any time to clean it, keeps your sleeping environment cleaner. Please note do not wash the pillow core.

Warm Tips: 1. Pillows cannot be used to treat cervical spondylosis. If you want to use it for medical rehabilitation, please consult a professional doctor and decide whether to buy it according to the doctor's recommendation. 2. The memory foam will have a very slight smell of polyurethane, if you are unacceptable, please ventilate 5 -7 days. 3. You can experience some discomfort within the first week, and your body tries to adjust to the correct location. Please be patient and give yourself an adaptation period. 4.After 2-3 months of use, it is recommended that you put the pillow in a cool place to ventilate for a few days to restore the elasticity of the pillow, eliminate odors, and restore dryness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars DONAMA PILLOW for Superior Sleep
reviews.reviewText: This pillow has proven great for improving my sleep.I have been using it for 2 weeks and have noticed improved quality of rest.It is super comfortable and supports my head in the proper position.No pain is the goal! Goal completed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best pillow - bought 2 more!
reviews.reviewText: I had my doubts about this pillow. I have tried A LOT of pillows and have had constant neck pain. When I finally laid down I couldn’t stop moving and thought FOR SURE I was going to throw it on the floor at like 1am.I haven’t slept on ONE pillow since maybe I was a baby BUT… on the first night I slept great!! and didnt have any additional neck pain!I did not move from the center of the pillow, besides the occasional roll to my side. It seriously cradles you into the middle of the pillow and fully supports your neck. (I am a back and side sleeper) the grooves on the side fully support your shoulders so you don’t end up with numbness in your arms or shoulders when you’re on your sides.I also slept on the more raised side, which I did not anticipate. I thought I would sleep on the lower side.I MAYBE would have bought the king size… but then again, I didn’t move out of that one spot, so I’m not sure I need the pillow to be any bigger. Since buying this pillow about a week ago, I have bought two more: one for my boyfriend who has stolen and slept with it, and my daughter who is also obsessed. 4 of my friends have also bought the pillow as well.I would say, if you have been searching for a pillow because of neck pain.. don’t wait, try this pillow. You will NOT be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars By far the best cervical pillow
reviews.reviewText: Over the last 3 months, I have purchased and returned 8 different cervical pillows (not including this one). And this did end up being the overall winner.I’ll be honest, this wasn’t the final one I bought. In fact, at first I didn’t want to keep it. It worked wonders for my snoring, I was tossing and turning less, and when I did turn, I would naturally move into the ideal place for the position I was in. Furthermore, the curves that allow for you to put your arms up at your side are the best designed out of any of the options I tried.However, the first several days, I did wake up with really bad neck pain that persisted throughout most of the day. At first, it was enough to look for other options. But the other options were either to soft and not supportive enough, or only really good if you were sure to stay sleeping on your back all night. So I eventually decided to give this another try, and I am so glad I did. This definitely feels different and is a much firmer pillow than most others. And it is higher up, which probably contributed to the neck pain initially. But after a few more nights sleep with it, either I just got used to it, or maybe was making sure I was in the most ideal position compared to before.No matter what the reason is, I am glad I stuck with it. After 3-4 nights tops, I have yet to wake up with the neck pain like I had at first. And I’m not tossing and turning, snoring much less, and overall just getting a better nights sleep

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and good for better sleep!
reviews.reviewText: I was tossing and turning all night with my other pillow. When I started using this one, I slept through the night like a baby. I used to wake up and need to crack my neck because of how I slept, but I was surprised I didn’t need to with this pillow. Very good shape for side sleeping and facing up. You can sleep however you want with it which is great. I threw on my satin pillow case and voila. Buy! Your neck will thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable, good neck support
reviews.reviewText: I brought this pillow for the neck pain which was there for ages. I used this pillow for a couple of days and I felt less pressure in neck and traps.I loved it for the above mentioned.Great pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great pillow…just not for me
reviews.reviewText: I have suffered with cervical neck and shoulder pain for years now. I have used another memory foam pillow in the past and had no issues. I received this pillow and was super excited to use it for the first time. I decided to give it a few days to air out like the directions say. That 1 night I slept on it I slept so good. I was comfortable and felt supported. However, i dont know what happened but it DESTROYED my face and neck. I woke up to my entire lower jaw/face/neck/upper chest COVERED in a rash. It was so painful. This was 1 month ago and I am still recovering. I had to be prescribed steroid pills, steroid creams, an antibiotic lotion and an oral antibiotic. Let’s not forget an antifungal for the yeast infection I developed due to the oral antibiotic. I did not sleep on this pillow again and went back to my old memory foam pillow. I dont know what happened and I’m not sure it’s the pillows fault. I am probably just sensitive to some type of chemical that’s in this thing. It did have a strong chemical smell. Even after letting it air out. I wanted to return it. However, I had throw out the manufacturer packaging and with Amazon you aren’t able to return an item without that. I’m at week 4 tho and my neck is still broken out but slowly recovering. I did give the pillow 3 stars because it is comfortable and well made. I slept well on it that one time. I didn’t care for the chemical smell even after days of letting it air out. Just be careful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally… THE pillow!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried every pillow out there and currently sleep with 5 (yes FIVE) pillows because I have to rotate them to have a good night’s sleep due to neck pain and headaches. I ordered this pillow 2 weeks ago and have had fantastic sleep and no pain since! What a relief to finally be able to sleep and not wake up with pain! As a bonus with this pillow I can actually sleep on my side again which I have not been able to do for years! I have now purchased 3 more pillows for my husband and sisters and they love them too.I will say the first 2-3 nights it may take some getting used to but afterwards pure bliss!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Concept, But was High
reviews.reviewText: This pillow has potential. The pillow elevated my neck to the point my head could not rest within the well. It over extended my neck to cause me to keep waking up. Had I been able to remove part of the pillow or it was an inch or so lower, it would have worked. I flipped the pillow to the backside and it seemed to be the right height, but did not have enough neck support. I wouldn't call it a pillow case, but the cover was soft.
